documentation.text:
@notice Request randomness from a user-provided seed
 @param _seed: seed provided by the GuitarSwap lottery

@notice Change the fee
 @param _fee: new fee (in LINK)

@notice Set the address for the GuitarLottery
 @param _guitarLottery: address of the GuitarSwap lottery
@notice Callback function used by ChainLink's VRF Coordinator

attributes.text:
@notice Request randomness from a user-provided seed
 @param _seed: seed provided by the GuitarSwap lottery

@notice Change the fee
 @param _fee: new fee (in LINK)

@notice Set the address for the GuitarLottery
 @param _guitarLottery: address of the GuitarSwap lottery
@notice Callback function used by ChainLink's VRF Coordinator

constructor.details: RandomNumberGenerator must be deployed before the lottery. Once the lottery contract is deployed, setLotteryAddress must be called. https://docs.chain.link/docs/vrf-contracts/

params._seed: : seed provided by the GuitarSwap lottery

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._tokenAddress: : the address of the token to withdraw
params._tokenAmount: : the number of token amount to withdraw

getRandomNumber(uint256).notice: Request randomness from a user-provided seed

setLotteryAddress(address).notice: Set the address for the GuitarLottery

withdrawTokens(address,uint256).notice: It allows the admin to withdraw tokens sent to the contract
